about_the_game:
The romance and glamour of the Roaring ‘20s is over; poverty and crime run rampant in the grimy streets of 1930s America. Jack Finch, a reclusive but hard-nosed detective, has sworn he’ll never work with another partner again. When he finds himself teamed up with the newly graduated police dog Archie, he wants nothing to do with the spunky canine.

But with a mass murderer on the loose and an ever-growing case file, the new team will have to learn to work together if they want to catch the culprit and restore peace to the city…

FEATURES

CO-OP PLAY:
Finch & Archie is a two player co-op. You can choose to be either weathered detective Jack Finch or good boy Archie. Please don’t fight over who gets to be the dog.

CHARACTER-SPECIFIC SKILLS:
Use either your magnifying glass or your excellent sense of smell to find and gather evidence that will help you with your case.

INTERROGATION:
Witnesses and suspects can be wily! Question their motives, find out their alibis and use evidence to catch them in a lie.

COMMUNICATION:
Because you are a human-dog partnership, communication does not come easy. You will have to be creative to explain your findings to your partner. The mystery cannot be solved without sharing evidence between yourselves…

short_description: An episodic co-op murder mystery in which you play as one half of a crime-fighting duo: Jack Finch the detective or Archie the police dog! Use your skills to find evidence, interrogate suspects, and catch the culprit in a gritty 1930s setting.
